articles.description: Madhuri Dixit met Rajinikanth during the semi-final match in Mumbai, where India scored a triumph. She shared an anecdote about working with the actor. | Bollywood
articles.content: Madhuri Dixit recently shared a picture with Rajinikanth when she watched the India vs New Zealand World Cup semi-final in Mumbai at the Wankhede stadium last week. Now, the actor has shared a heartf… [+1830 chars]

articles.title: Sushmita's sister-in-law Charu pens note, posts precious pics on her birthday - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sushmita Sen's sister-in-law Charu Asopa has shared a bunch of unseen pictures with the actor to wish her on her 48th birthday. | Bollywood
articles.content: Sushmita Sen is celebrating her 48th birthday on Sunday. To mark this special occasion, Sushmita's former sister-in-law Charu Asopa has shared a bunch of unseen pictures with the actor and penned a h… [+1938 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol
articles.title: What Shweta Sharda wore at 72nd Miss Universe pageant - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Shweta Sharda represented India at the coveted 72nd Miss Universe pageant held at El Salvador on November 19 (IST).
articles.content: For the preliminary interview, Sharda, who is a dancer and choreographer, wore a pair of chic pants with a flowy tunic. The outfit was designed by Rohit Gandhi and Rahul Khanna.

articles.author: Our Correspondent
articles.title: Bollywood's star struck selfies with David Beckham - Onmanorama
articles.description: David who is the UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador visited India recently to assess the agency's work in rural India. He met with a lot of Bollywood stars.david beckham India visit. David Beckham meets bollywood divas. david beckham unicef ambassador india visit
articles.content:
Karisma Kapoor was visibly star struck after meeting the football legend. 'Did it for the kids..Not really,' she joked.
